verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

נְקֹ֗ם <S%H5358><s%> Take נִקְמַת֙ <S%H5360><s%> full בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> הַמִּדְיָנִ֑ים <S%H4084><s%> of the Midianites אַחַ֖ר <S%H310><s%> afterward תֵּאָסֵ֥ף <S%H622><s%> shalt thou be gathered אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עַמֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H5971><s%> unto thy people

וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> spake מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying הֵחָלְצ֧וּ <S%H2502><s%> Arm מֵאִתְּכֶ֛ם <S%H853><s%> אֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> men לַצָּבָ֑א <S%H6635><s%> of yourselves unto the war וְיִהְיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> may go עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against מִדְיָ֔ן <S%H4080><s%> and let them go against the Midianites לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> to execute נִקְמַת־ <S%H5360><s%> vengeance יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּמִדְיָֽן׃ <S%H4080><s%> of Midian

אֶ֚לֶף <S%H505><s%> A thousand לַמַּטֶּ֔ה <S%H4294><s%> throughout all the tribes אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> A thousand לַמַּטֶּ֑ה <S%H4294><s%> the tribes לְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> of all מַטּ֣וֹת <S%H4294><s%> the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel תִּשְׁלְח֖וּ <S%H7971><s%> shall ye send לַצָּבָֽא׃ <S%H6635><s%> to the war

וַיִּמָּֽסְרוּ֙ <S%H4560><s%> So there were delivered מֵאַלְפֵ֣י <S%H505><s%> out of the thousands יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> a thousand לַמַּטֶּ֑ה <S%H4294><s%> of [every] tribe שְׁנֵים־ <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> ten אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand חֲלוּצֵ֥י <S%H2502><s%> armed צָבָֽא׃ <S%H6635><s%> for war

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> sent אֹתָ֥ם <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶ֥לֶף <S%H505><s%> a thousand לַמַּטֶּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> of [every] tribe לַצָּבָ֑א <S%H6635><s%> them to the war אֹ֠תָם <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּ֨ינְחָ֜ס <S%H6372><s%> them and Phinehas בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֶלְעָזָ֤ר <S%H499><s%> of Eleazar הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> the priest לַצָּבָ֔א <S%H6635><s%> to the war וּכְלֵ֥י <S%H3627><s%> instruments הַקֹּ֛דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> with the holy וַחֲצֹצְר֥וֹת <S%H2689><s%> and the trumpets הַתְּרוּעָ֖ה <S%H8643><s%> to blow בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand

וַֽיִּצְבְּאוּ֙ <S%H6633><s%> And they warred עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against מִדְיָ֔ן <S%H4080><s%> against the Midianites כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses וַיַּֽהַרְג֖וּ <S%H2026><s%> and they slew כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every זָכָֽר׃ <S%H2145><s%> all the males

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַלְכֵ֨י <S%H4428><s%> the kings מִדְיָ֜ן <S%H4080><s%> of Midian הָרְג֣וּ <S%H2026><s%> And they slew עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> beside חַלְלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H2491><s%> the rest of them that were slain אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱוִ֤י <S%H189><s%> [namely] Evi וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֶ֙קֶם֙ <S%H7552><s%> and Rekem וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צ֤וּר <S%H6698><s%> and Zur וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חוּר֙ <S%H2354><s%> and Hur וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֶ֔בַע <S%H7254><s%> and Reba חֲמֵ֖שֶׁת <S%H2568><s%> five מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> kings מִדְיָ֑ן <S%H4080><s%> of Midian וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> בִּלְעָ֣ם <S%H1109><s%> Balaam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> also the son בְּע֔וֹר <S%H1160><s%> of Beor הָרְג֖וּ <S%H2026><s%> they slew בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> with the sword

וַיִּשְׁבּ֧וּ <S%H7617><s%> captives בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נְשֵׁ֥י <S%H802><s%> took [all] the women מִדְיָ֖ן <S%H4080><s%> of Midian וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> טַפָּ֑ם <S%H2945><s%> and their little ones וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בְּהֶמְתָּ֧ם <S%H929><s%> of all their cattle וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מִקְנֵהֶ֛ם <S%H4735><s%> and all their flocks וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all חֵילָ֖ם <S%H2428><s%> and all their goods בָּזָֽזוּ׃ <S%H962><s%> and took the spoil

וְאֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עָרֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5892><s%> all their cities בְּמ֣וֹשְׁבֹתָ֔ם <S%H4186><s%> wherein they dwelt וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all טִֽירֹתָ֑ם <S%H2918><s%> and all their goodly castles שָׂרְפ֖וּ <S%H8313><s%> And they burnt בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> with fire

וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> And they took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַשָּׁלָ֔ל <S%H7998><s%> all the spoil וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַמַּלְק֑וֹחַ <S%H4455><s%> and all the prey בָּאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> [both] of men וּבַבְּהֵמָֽה׃ <S%H929><s%> and of beasts

וַיָּבִ֡אוּ <S%H935><s%> And they brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁה֩ <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to אֶלְעָזָ֨ר <S%H499><s%> and Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to עֲדַ֣ת <S%H5712><s%> and unto the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשְּׁבִ֧י <S%H7628><s%> the captives וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּלְק֛וֹחַ <S%H4455><s%> and the prey וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׁלָ֖ל <S%H7998><s%> and the spoil אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> unto the camp אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at עַֽרְבֹ֣ת <S%H6160><s%> at the plains מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> are by יַרְדֵּ֥ן <S%H3383><s%> which [are] by Jordan יְרֵחֽוֹ׃ <S%H3405><s%> [near] Jericho ס

וַיֵּ֨צְא֜וּ <S%H3318><s%> went forth מֹשֶׁ֨ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וְאֶלְעָזָ֧ר <S%H499><s%> and Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all נְשִׂיאֵ֥י <S%H5387><s%> and all the princes הָעֵדָ֖ה <S%H5712><s%> of the congregation לִקְרָאתָ֑ם <S%H7125><s%> to meet אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> them without לַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> the camp

וַיִּקְצֹ֣ף <S%H7107><s%> was wroth מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> with פְּקוּדֵ֣י <S%H6485><s%> with the officers הֶחָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> of the host שָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> [with] the captains הָאֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> over thousands וְשָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> and captains הַמֵּא֔וֹת <S%H3967><s%> over hundreds הַבָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> which came מִצְּבָ֥א <S%H6635><s%> from הַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> the battle

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> and מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses הַֽחִיִּיתֶ֖ם <S%H2421><s%> unto them Have ye saved כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נְקֵבָֽה׃ <S%H5347><s%> all the women

הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold הֵ֜נָּה <S%H2007><s%> Behold these הָי֨וּ <S%H1961><s%> caused לִבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> through the counsel בִּלְעָ֔ם <S%H1109><s%> of Balaam לִמְסָר־ <S%H4560><s%> to commit מַ֥עַל <S%H4604><s%> trespass בַּיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> in the matter פְּע֑וֹר <S%H6465><s%> of Peor וַתְּהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> caused הַמַּגֵּפָ֖ה <S%H4046><s%> and there was a plague בַּעֲדַ֥ת <S%H5712><s%> among the congregation יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> Now הִרְג֥וּ <S%H2026><s%> Now therefore kill כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every זָכָ֖ר <S%H2145><s%> every male בַּטָּ֑ף <S%H2945><s%> among the little ones וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every אִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> every woman יֹדַ֥עַת <S%H3045><s%> that hath known אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man לְמִשְׁכַּ֥ב <S%H4904><s%> by lying זָכָ֖ר <S%H2145><s%> with him הֲרֹֽגוּ׃ <S%H2026><s%> and kill

וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all הַטַּ֣ף <S%H2945><s%> children בַּנָּשִׁ֔ים <S%H802><s%> But all the women אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not יָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> that have not known מִשְׁכַּ֣ב <S%H4904><s%> by lying זָכָ֑ר <S%H2145><s%> a man הַחֲי֖וּ <S%H2421><s%> with him keep alive לָכֶֽם׃

וְאַתֶּ֗ם <S%H859><s%> and you חֲנ֛וּ <S%H2583><s%> And do ye abide מִח֥וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> the camp שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> days כֹּל֩ <S%H3605><s%> whoever הֹרֵ֨ג <S%H2026><s%> whosoever hath killed נֶ֜פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> any person וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> and whoever נֹגֵ֣עַ <S%H5060><s%> and whosoever hath touched בֶּֽחָלָ֗ל <S%H2491><s%> any slain תִּֽתְחַטְּא֞וּ <S%H2398><s%> purify בַּיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁי֙ <S%H7992><s%> on the third וּבַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> and on the seventh אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you וּשְׁבִיכֶֽם׃ <S%H7628><s%> [both] yourselves and your captives

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every בֶּ֧גֶד <S%H899><s%> all [your] raiment וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every כְּלִי־ <S%H3627><s%> and all that is made ע֛וֹר <S%H5785><s%> of skins וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> and all work עִזִּ֖ים <S%H5795><s%> of goats' וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all כְּלִי־ <S%H3627><s%> [hair] and all things made עֵ֑ץ <S%H6086><s%> of wood תִּתְחַטָּֽאוּ׃ <S%H2398><s%> And purify ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֶלְעָזָ֤ר <S%H499><s%> And Eleazar הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> the priest אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> unto אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H582><s%> unto the men הַצָּבָ֔א <S%H6635><s%> of war הַבָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> which went לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> to the battle זֹ֚את <S%H2063><s%> likewise חֻקַּ֣ת <S%H2708><s%> This [is] the ordinance הַתּוֹרָ֔ה <S%H8451><s%> of the law אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses

אַ֥ךְ <S%H389><s%> only אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַזָּהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> Only the gold וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and the silver אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H5178><s%> the brass אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּרְזֶ֔ל <S%H1270><s%> the iron אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּדִ֖יל <S%H913><s%> the tin וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֹפָֽרֶת׃ <S%H5777><s%> and the lead

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everything דָּבָ֞ר <S%H1697><s%> Every thing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that יָבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> that may abide בָאֵ֗שׁ <S%H784><s%> the fire תַּעֲבִ֤ירוּ <S%H5674><s%> ye shall make [it] go through בָאֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> the fire וְטָהֵ֔ר <S%H2891><s%> and it shall be clean אַ֕ךְ <S%H389><s%> also בְּמֵ֥י <S%H4325><s%> with the water נִדָּ֖ה <S%H5079><s%> of separation יִתְחַטָּ֑א <S%H2398><s%> nevertheless it shall be purified וְכֹ֨ל <S%H3605><s%> everything אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot יָבֹ֛א <S%H935><s%> and all that abideth בָּאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> not the fire תַּעֲבִ֥ירוּ <S%H5674><s%> ye shall make go through בַמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> the water

וְכִבַּסְתֶּ֧ם <S%H3526><s%> And ye shall wash בִּגְדֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H899><s%> your clothes בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <S%H7637><s%> on the seventh וּטְהַרְתֶּ֑ם <S%H2891><s%> and ye shall be clean וְאַחַ֖ר <S%H310><s%> and afterward תָּבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> ye shall come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> into the camp פ
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying
